long_description: Winner of the 2008. Turning up the heat another notch, the Hyllus hoodie has a high-loft interior for warmth and an air-permeable outer face for maximum breathability. Polartec(R) Power Shield(R) O2 fabric has a clean, non-pilling face for friction-free layering and breathes well. Warm, high-loft fleecy lining holds warmth in while wicking moisture away from skin. Adjustable hood with a laminated brim contributes warmth at a moment's notice. Hand and sleeve pockets feature durable, laminated zippers. Articulated elbows and No-lift gusseted underarms ensure a comfortable fit. Features stretch-knit gusseted cuffs and a laminated hem drawcord. A-shaped cut and angled pockets accentuate the feminine form.
short_description: Winner of the 2008 Outside magazine Gear of the Year award, featured in their inaugural Winter Edition Buyer's Guide!
